wiktionary_senses.definition: The cessation of life and all associated processes; the end of an organism's existence as an entity independent from its environment and its return to an inert, nonliving state.
The cessation of life and all associated processes; the end of an organism's existence as an entity independent from its environment and its return to an inert, nonliving state.
The personification of death as a (usually male) hooded figure with a scythe; the Grim Reaper.
The collapse or end of something.
The collapse or end of something.
The personification of death, often a skeleton with a scythe, and one of the four horsemen of the apocalypse.
